Client Work

Dr. Golnaz Golnaraghi

Dr. Golnaz Golnaraghi

Golnaz is an senior facilitator, educator, researcher, author and speaker who is passionate about leadership development, diversity in workplaces, creative problem solving, positive psychology and emotional intelligence.

She completed her doctorate in the area of diversity and social justice in the workplace and has presented at conferences internationally and published her work in blogs, books, magazines and journals. She has held management positions and consulted in a variety of industries including professional services, financial services, hospitality, not-for-profit and education.
